cause.description:
Each of us has the ability to foster positive self-esteem – both in others and ourselves. Almost everyone touches the life of a young girl in some way. Make a difference today, make someone smile.
<33
1. Each individual person has unique beauty through and through.
2. This world has all their ideals of what is/isn't beautiful screwed up. We're here to change that.
cause.mission: Changing the current, narrow definition of beauty.
cause.name: Dove Self Esteem Fund
